comments.body: I don't think this would work for `Map`, as in that case there are 2 child column vectors but `appendArray()` is still used. Alternatively I could fix this by putting these reserves in `ArrayConverter` and `MapConverter`. Then we could manually unroll those loops there, but code that uses `appendArray` would have to be careful to call reserve on the child vectors before calling `appendArray`. WDYT?
Ah, I see. I noticed now that the map/array converters share this same method.
